name: Medieval simulators: Tavern
description:
A relaxing tavern construction simulator for lovers of the Middle Ages and snowy locations. You manage your own tavern, you will not only need to build and arrange floors, walls and decorations, but also monitor various resources, manage the economy and balance between working buildings. You can create one huge tavern, or separate them and create many taverns on one map.




  • You create the world yourself
  • Building structures
  • Atmosphere of the snowy biome
  • Author's soundtracks from the developer

Welcome to the game "Medieval simulators: Tavern" and enjoy the game. :)
